mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NUMBER,MEMBER_ID,MEMBER_PASSWORD,MEMBER_NAME,MEMBER_PHONE_NUMBER,MEMBER_BIRTHDATE, FROM( SELECT M.MEMBER_NUMBER,M.MEMBER_ID,M.MEMBER_PASSWORD,G.MEMBER_NAME,G.MEMBER_PHONE_NUMBER,G.MEMBER_BIRTHDATE FROM TBL_MEMBER M JOIN TBL_GENERAL_MEMBER G ON M.MEMBER_NUMBER=G.MEMBER_NUMBER )SUBQUERY
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER_NUMBER,MEMBER_ID,MEMBER_PASSWORD,MEMBER_NAME,MEMBER_PHONE_NUMBER,MEMBER_BIRTHDATE, SET( UPDATE M.MEMBER_NUMBER,M.MEMBER_ID,M.MEMBER_PASSWORD,G.MEMBER_NAME,G.MEMBER_PHONE_NUMBER,G.MEMBER_BIRTHDATE SET TBL_MEMBER M JOIN TBL_GENERAL_MEMBER G ON M.MEMBER_NUMBER=G.MEMBER_NUMBER )SUBQUERY
